E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/29/1988
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Tom Brookens



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1988
Subject: Progress of George Hinshaw
Dear Sir,
George Hinshaw is hitting the ball well at A Modesto A's!
He has an AVG of .481, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
